full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,NGAN SONG SBYONG RGYUD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
translator_(орчуулагч): SHANTIm KARBH'A, DZA YA RAKshI TA, DZI NA MITRA, BDAB LA BRTZEGS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @072A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS NGAN SONG THAMS CAD RNAM PAR 'JOMS PA GZI BRJID KYI RGYAL PO'I BRTAG PA PHYOGS GCIG PA LAS, RTZA BA'I RGYUD ZUR DU BKOL PA RDZOGS SO, , @072B RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SHANTIm KARBH'A DANG, BOD KYI LO TZ'A BA DZA YA RAKshI TAS BSGYUR CING ZHUS, A'A TZARYA RIN CHEN MCHOG GIS SKANG GSAR GCAD KYIS BCOS NAS GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,SLAD KYI RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO DZI NA MITRA DANG, LO TZ'A BA SKA BDAB LA BRTZEGS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
